DOC.brief_summary: In this study, the aim is to compare the efficacy of Periarticular multimodal drug injection(group PI) and Fascia Iliaca Compartment Block ( group FI)for total knee arthroplasty.
DOC.brief_title: Periarticular Injection Versus Fascia Iliaca Block for Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: Total knee arthroplasty is very painful surgical intervention.Patients were assigned to 2 groups to receive either periarticular multimodal drug injection or fascia iliaca compartment block for postoperative pain.
DOC.criteria: patients undergoing knee arthroplasty > 18 years of age obesity heart failure kidney failure liver failure
